Location.Description: You are in the Treasure Chest, a discreet strip club. You are in a small room off to the side of the building, crammed a little too full of shelves with sex toys, skin flicks Bluerays, DvDs, and video cassettes, lubricants, uninflated love dolls packaged tightly in cardboard boxes, and all other manner of adult pleasureware. All marked up at rediculous prices, of course. You can't help but grin a little at the so-called 'kinky' stuff you come across. In the world of magic and witchcraft, you've experienced things that would blow any regular human's mind...
